long_description: Serious water wars await with the Stream Machine TL-600 water launcher. If you'd rather be on the water instead of getting doused by it, the TL-750 also serves as a fast bilge pump for your boat. 12 in. water launcher sends a stream of water up to 70 ft. so you can soak opponents near and far. In the time it takes ordinary water guns to be refilled once, the TL-750 can be refilled and emptied several times; just dip the end into water and pull back the plunger. High-impact polymer offers strength and durability to last all summer long. The Stream Machine TL-600 water launcher doubles as a quick, compact and effective bilge pump for your kayaking or canoeing adventures.
short_description: Serious water wars await with the Stream Machine TL-600 water launcher. If you'd rather be on the water instead of getting doused by it, the TL-750 also serves as a fast bilge pump for your boat.
